comments.raw_text:
The inline images do not get underlined anymore when inside a link.

Also text-decoration css property does not work anymore on inline images (see url)

don't know if it is a new css compliant feature or not but it worked with firefox 7 and before

(not in quirk mode though see http://roger21.free.fr/tests/testq.html)
